author: Francis X. Rocca
title: U.S. Donors Balk at $25 Million Vatican Request
text:
ROME—A dispute has erupted between wealthy American donors and a Catholic charity over the Vatican’s request for a multimillion-dollar grant, causing unusual friction between church leadership and laity and prompting calls for greater lay oversight of church finances.
